text: Marie of Mecklenburg, born sometime between 1363 and 1367, but probably by 1365, dead after 13 May 1402, was a duchess of Pomerania.Lars Ulwencreutz Ulwencreutz's The Royal Families in Europe V She was the daughter of Duke Henry III, Duke of Mecklenburg (death 1383) and the Danish princess Ingeborg of Denmark, Duchess of Mecklenburg (death 1370),Herzogin Marie zu Mecklenburg- Schwerin was Duchess of Pomerania. == History == She married 1380, before March 23, with Duke Wartislaw VII, Duke of Pomerania Albrekt-släkten Maria av Mecklenburg Henriksdotter(fallen 1394 or 1395) and together they had one son and a daughter: * Bogusław (born about 1382, dead 1459), better known as the Kalmar Union King Eric of Pomerania; and, * Catherine (born about 1390, dead 1426), married to Count palatine John, Count Palatine of Neumarkt (born about 1383, dead 1443). Maria was also possibly the heir to her aunt, the Nordic Union Queen Margaret I of Denmark. == See also == *House of Knýtlinga == References == Category:House of Knýtlinga Category:14th-century Danish people Category:1360s births Category:1402 deaths
title: Maria of Mecklenburg-Schwerin
